name: The Albany Console
description: The Albany is an elegant best-selling console table with a strong Art Deco inspiration with graceful curves and sublime finishing leading the way in high end furniture design. This beautiful, highly sought-after console can be finished in any of DAVIDSON's luxury finishes with a central block and smart trim to the lower table top edge in one of DAVIDSON's luxury metal trims giving this table an extra edge of contemporary confidence. Different finish options offer a variety of looks and are of personal choice, including a simple but elegant contrasting black lacquer or a luxurious smooth gilded shimmer. The Albany console would work perfectly in any smart hallway on its own or as a pair, in the alcoves of a sophisticated living room or complete a collection of luxurious bedroom furniture.
